data: `minecraft:behavior.vex_copy_owner_target` allows an entity of the`vex` family to target the same entity as it's owner.
`minecraft:behavior.vex_copy_owner_target` is no longer used for the `vex` entity.

data.Name: [entity_types](../Definitions/NestedTables/entity_types.md)
data.Description: List of entities this mob can copy the owner from

data: `entity_types` is a JSON Object variable that can use the following parameters:

data.Name: filters
data.Description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid.

data.Name: max_dist
data.Description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice.

data.Name: must_see
data.Description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice.

data.Name: must_see_forget_duration
data.Description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more.

data.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.

data.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.
